subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, the No. 2 seed, has an easier route to the men’s final than No. 1 Novak Djokovic, who could face Stan Wawrinka and Andy Murray.
snippet: Roger Federer, the No. 2 seed, has an easier route to the men’s final than No. 1 Novak Djokovic, who could face Stan Wawrinka and Andy Murray.
